function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Diffusion of infectious diseases through interpersonal transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of viral transmission in the context of spatial diffusion","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Different types of spatial diffusion facilitating the spread of infectious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Globalization as a driver of covid-19 diffusion","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of social and geographic factors in covid-19 diffusion","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Urban connectivity and covid-19 diffusion","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Concerns regarding individual rights and privacy","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using yolo for social distancing monitoring without considering its limitations and potential pitfalls","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of pedestrian detections and social distancing indicators","category":"Security","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overreliance on single-model performance without considering the context and limitations of other detection models","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on public dataset for evaluation","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of surveillance data for monitoring physical distancing","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perspective transformation of video feed","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of privacy in social distancing monitoring may not be acceptable for many individuals","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data-driven approach development for covid-19 clustering algorithm","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Computer vision-based monitoring without privacy protection","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of statistical analysis and deployment direction for social distancing monitoring approach","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of mass video surveillance system without clear ethical guidelines","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of video surveillance for monitoring crowded areas","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of large image datasets may lead to privacy concerns and potential misuse of data.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social media event analysis may lead to the spread of misinformation and panic in the population.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mass video surveillance may lead to concerns regarding the centralized collection and storage of sensitive data.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass video surveillance for social distancing monitoring","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of individuals with disease symptoms through video surveillance","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time monitoring of physical contacts between individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial constraints in construction companies due to lack of spending on construction projects","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents in disagreement about construction firms determining ideal projects actively pursuing","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large percentage of respondents in disagreement about construction companies adjusting schedule to avoid slowdown bottleneck","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Significant number of respondents in disagreement about construction companies improving office productivity and lowering overhead costs","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low number of respondents with phd level of education may result in a lack of expertise in public health and disease control within the construction workforce","category":"Education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Male respondents were found to be more than females in the research study, indicating potential gender-specific differences in disease exposure and susceptibility.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data analysis involved close interaction with the respondents, increasing the risk of disease transmission during the research process.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gathering data from 30 participants may not be representative of the entire construction industry in the uk.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using closed-ended questions and predetermined interview questions may limit the depth of data collected.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on likert scale responses may oversimplify participants’ views and experiences.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stratified random sampling approach may not fully represent the diversity of the population, leading to biased results.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small sample size of 30 may not capture the full variability of the population, leading to limited generalizability of the findings.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of online survey questionnaire and video conferencing for data collection","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sampling technique for population selection","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of quantitative research design for data collection","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mixing of large numbers of individuals for data collection quantitative research","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Face-to-face interviews with project managers, contractors, and site engineers qualitative research","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of study on the impact of pandemic on construction industry","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect on gdp and economic stability","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enormous energy consumption of blockchain technology","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unavailability of secure and reliable data sharing in education sector","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption in the global supply chain for medical equipment and pharmaceuticals.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of inaccurate data on social platforms causing panic and fear.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring of quarantine cases and slow drug supply.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data accuracy and integrity in disease surveillance","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
